Level Description: Proficient (shows most elements clearly and correctly)
CAN: The student can draw the material before heating, clearly showing its initial state as solid ice.
The student can draw the material after heating, illustrating ice becoming liquid water.
The student can show the process of liquid water turning back into ice through cooling.
CANNOT: The student may not clearly indicate which changes are reversible and which are not through labeling or text annotations.
The student might inconsistently use arrows or labels to show the direction of the changes (e.g., may forget to label one stage or use arrows inconsistently).
